name: Resolution of Unfinished Business
description: Ghosts may need to resolve some issue or unfinished business from their life before they can move on.

name: Acceptance of Death
description: Some ghosts may not even realize they are dead and may need to come to terms with their own death.

name: Revenge or Justice
description: In some stories, a ghost may need to see justice served or revenge taken before they can rest.

name: Proper Burial
description: In many cultures, ghosts cannot move on until they receive a proper burial or funeral rites.

name: Reconciliation
description: The ghost may need to reconcile with someone they wronged in life or someone who wronged them.

name: Retrieval of Lost Items
description: Sometimes, ghosts are tied to this realm due to lost or stolen items that they valued greatly.

name: Release of Guilt
description: Some ghosts carry intense guilt from actions they took during their life. This guilt may need to be absolved before they can move on.

name: Uncovering Truth
description: Ghosts who died under mysterious circumstances may need the truth of their death revealed.

name: Protection
description: If a ghost stayed to protect a loved one, they may need assurance that their loved one will be safe without them.

name: Exorcism
description: In some traditions, a ghost needs to be forcefully sent to the next realm by an exorcism.

name: Ceremony
description: Certain cultures believe a ritual or ceremony can help a ghost move on.

name: Forgiveness
description: Sometimes a ghost needs to forgive or be forgiven to move on.

name: Love
description: In some tales, the power of love can help a ghost transition to the other side.

name: Passage of Time
description: Some ghosts simply need to wait for a certain amount of time before they can move on.

name: Fulfillment of a Promise
description: Some ghosts may have made a promise in their life that they need to fulfill before they can rest.
